sentences.en: a pile of books
sentences.cn: 一摞书

sentences.en: a pile of sewing
sentences.cn: 一堆针线活儿

sentences.en: a pile of unread newspapers
sentences.cn: 一摞未看的报纸

sentences.en: He awoke to find himself lying uncomfortably on a pile of firewood.
sentences.cn: 他醒来发现自己躺在一堆柴火上，很不舒服。

sentences.en: He balanced the plate on the top of a pile of books.
sentences.cn: 他把盘子在一摞书上放稳。

sentences.en: He burrowed into the pile of charts feverishly.
sentences.cn: 他非常紧张地在一堆图表中翻找。

sentences.en: He was piling clothes into the suitcase.
sentences.cn: 他正把衣服叠放到手提箱中去。

sentences.en: I soon discovered I was at the bottom of the pile in the office hierarchy.
sentences.cn: 我很快发现自己在办公室里处于最底层。

sentences.en: I've got a pile of questions afterwards for you.
sentences.cn: 我有一大堆的问题等着过后问你。

sentences.en: Its brass feet dented the carpet's thick pile.
sentences.cn: 其黄铜支脚把厚绒地毯压出了印。

sentences.en: Ma stacked the cups and piled the plates.
sentences.cn: 妈妈把杯盘堆叠起来。

sentences.en: On the table beside an empty plate was a pile of books.
sentences.cn: 桌上空盘子的旁边是一堆书。

sentences.en: Pick over the fruit and pile on top of the cream.
sentences.cn: 拣出好的水果，码放在奶油上。

sentences.en: She dug out a photograph from under a pile of papers.
sentences.cn: 她从一堆报纸下面抽出一张照片。

sentences.en: The clothes were folded in a neat pile.
sentences.cn: 衣服叠放成整齐的一摞。

sentences.en: The entire pile shifted and slid, thumping onto the floor.
sentences.cn: 那整整一摞东西动了一下后滑落下来，嘭的一声全掉到了地上。

sentences.en: The leaves had been raked into a pile.
sentences.cn: 树叶已经用耙子拢成了一堆。

sentences.en: The pile of books toppled over.
sentences.cn: 那一摞书倒了。

sentences.en: The room was piled high with boxes (= filled with a lot of boxes ) .
sentences.cn: 房间里高高地堆着一些箱子。

sentences.en: They found the body buried beneath a pile of leaves.
sentences.cn: 他们发现尸体被埋在一堆树叶下面。

phrases.tran_cn: 螺旋钻孔桩；填充桩；螺旋桩
【非正式用语】 撞车：经历一次严重交通工具相撞

trans.tran_cn: 堆，摞，大量，高大建筑，桩，痔疮，绒面
trans.tran_en: a group of several things of the same type that are put on top of each other
If you pile things somewhere, you put them there so that they form a pile
